testsuite.name: OrderPlacement
testsuite.system-out: Navigated to: https://puffy.com/products/puffy-lux-mattress Default model Twin is selected Verified default model: Twin specifications
Navigated to: https://puffy.com/products/puffy-lux-mattress Product images/video slides are displayed

Navigated to: https://puffy.com/products/puffy-lux-mattress Clicked on model: Queen Product size is displayed as: 60"W x 80"L x 12"H Product price is displayed as: $2,249
Navigated to: https://puffy.com/products/puffy-lux-mattress Clicked on model: Queen Model price: $2,249 Navigated to checkout page Checked out screen is displayed

testcase.name: verifyItemNameAndQuantityPassedFromListingToCheckoutScreen

failure.message: Item name and quantity of the selected product is displayed as the same in checkout screen expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: Item name and quantity of the selected product is displayed as the same in checkout screen expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:97) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:969) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:43) at OrderPlacement.verifyItemNameAndQuantityPassedFromListingToCheckoutScreen(OrderPlacement.java:180) at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62) at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43) at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:566) at org.testng.internal.MethodInvocationHelper.invokeMethod(MethodInvocationHelper.java:134) at org.testng.internal.TestInvoker.invokeMethod(TestInvoker.java:597) at org.testng.internal.TestInvoker.invokeTestMethod(TestInvoker.java:173) at org.testng.internal.MethodRunner.runInSequence(MethodRunner.java:46) at org.testng.internal.TestInvoker$MethodInvocationAgent.invoke(TestInvoker.java:816) at org.testng.internal.TestInvoker.invokeTestMethods(TestInvoker.java:146) at org.testng.internal.TestMethodWorker.invokeTestMethods(TestMethodWorker.java:146) at org.testng.internal.TestMethodWorker.run(TestMethodWorker.java:128) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1128) at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:628) at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:829)
